document.full_text: ousted "american idol" contestant casey abrams said on friday he was proud of bringing a fresh jazz twist to the tv show, but admitted that his signature growl might have been too much for audiences to take.
document.title: casey abrams proud of bringing jazz to "idol"
lines_and_colors: ousted "american idol" contestant casey abrams said on friday he was proud of bringing a fresh jazz twist to the tv show, but admitted that his signature growl might have been too much for audiences to take.
